Description: Hosted by the Associate Member Council (AMC), Associate members will gather for an informal Meet and Greet and network with other early-career attendees.  Members will obtain information about programs, events, and initiatives specifically for Associate members, both at the conference and throughout the year; and meet with those representatives who are advocating to the AACR on behalf of the needs and concerns of graduate students, medical students and residents, and clinical and postdoctoral fellows. Remarks will be made by Associate Member Council Officers. Associate members who are recipients of awards, fellowships, and participated in special AACR programs will be recognized during the event. Raffle prizes will be given during the event. Refreshments will be provided.
Location: Grand Hall B - Manchester Grand Hyatt San Diego
